'"Reach"' is a song from an American metalcore band Eyes Set to Kill. It was
released February 5, 2008 and was the lead single of the band from their debut
album [[Reach (Eyes Set to Kill album)|Reach]]. Alexia Rodriguez is now the
vocals after Lindsey Vogt left. An acoustic version of the song will be included
on Lexia's debut [[Underground Sounds]].
